content: la rentrée | page 3 directions neckband and short-row shaping with smaller 16 / 40 cm circular needles and two strands of laceweight yarn held together cast on 84 90 96 102 108 114 120 120 120 120 sts place bor marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches work 1 x 1 twisted rib for 3 5 / 9 cm all sizes knit 1 round short-row shaping short-row shaping will raise the back neck slightly we recommend the german short row method you can find a great tutorial by verypink knits on youtube here https //www youtube com/watch v=52qy8oob-s0 step 1 rs knit 14 16 18 20 22 24 26 26 26 26 sts work gsr step 2 ws purl to bor marker do not turn continue to step 3 step 3 ws purl 42 45 51 51 54 57 60 60 60 60 sts work gsr step 4 rs knit to bor marker repeat steps 1 - 4 four more times but each time work 3 sts past the last gsr turn note that turn sts look like two sts because of the method used but are worked/counted as 1 st yoke switch to 16 / 40 cm main gauge needles as you move through the yoke increases change to 24 / 60 cm and 32 / 80 cm or 40 / 100 cm circular needles as necessary i e when stitches become too cramped on the needles knit 3 3 3 5 7 7 7 7 7 7 rnds © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only la rentrée | page 4 increase round 1 size 1 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 28 sts increased 112 sts size 2 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 30 sts increased 120 sts size 3 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 32 sts increased 128 sts size 4 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 34 sts increased 136 sts size 5 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 36 sts increased 144 sts size 6 * k3 ll1 repeat from * to end 38 sts increased 152 sts size 7 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 60 sts increased 180 sts size 8 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 60 sts increased 180 sts size 9 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 60 sts increased 180 sts size 10 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 60 sts increased 180 sts knit 4 4 4 6 8 8 8 8 8 8 rnds increase round 2 size 1 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 56 sts increased 168 sts size 2 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 60 sts increased 180 sts size 3 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to end 64 sts increased 192 sts size 4 * k2 ll1 repeat from * to
